__TOC__

= Removing Ubuntu Stickers =;
If you want to remove your Ubuntu sticker from your machine then you shall require

* Lint free cloth
* Nail polish remover

== Removal ==;
* Peel off the sticker.
* Apply nail polish remover to cloth.
* Rub away the residue with the cloth.
